entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
